titles.title: Praise The Lord, Praise The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Praise the Lord, praise the Lord.
Let all God's people, praise the Lord!
Shake off those heavy bands.
Lift up those holy hands.
Let all God's people, praise the Lord!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Praise the Lord, praise the Lord.
Let all God's people praise the Lord!
Shake off those heavy bands,
Lift up those feet and dance!
Let all God's people praise the Lord!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Alaba a Dios, alaba a Dios,
Que todo el pueblo alabe a Dios!
Sacude tus ataduras.
Levanta tus manos santas.
Que todo el pueblo alabe a Dios!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Alaba a Dios, alaba a Dios.
Que todo el pueblo alabe a Dios!
Sacude tus ataduras,
Y alaba a Dios con danzas,
Que todo el pueblo alabe a Dios!
